name: ElmTestBDDStyle

aliases.name: Assertion
aliases.comment: Assertion type, use that for building custom matchers

values.name: describe
values.comment: A group of related behaviours specs

values.name: expect
values.comment:
Expectation to actually run the test, it receives
two values and try to match then with a matcher

values.name: expectThat
values.comment: Generates a hundred tests with random input beginning with the initial seed 1
values.type: (a -> b) -> ElmTestBDDStyle.Conjunction -> (a -> b) -> ElmTestBDDStyle.Conjunction -> Check.Investigator.Investigator a -> String -> ElmTestBDDStyle.Test

values.name: it
values.comment: Describes a behaviour you expect from your code

values.name: itAlways
values.comment: Adds a description to the random generated tests

values.name: notToBe
values.comment: Expect something not to be equals something else

values.name: toBe
values.comment: Expect something to be equals something else
